text: Degeneration is deterioration in the medical sense. Generally, it is the change from a higher to a lower form. More specifically, it is the change of tissue to a lower or less functionally active form. *True degeneration: when there is actual chemical change of the tissue itself. *Infiltration: when the change consists of the deposit of abnormal matter in the tissues *Degenerative disease ==See also== *macular degeneration *neurodegenerative disease ==References== Dorland's Illustrated Medical Dictionary (Twenty-sixth Edition) () Category:Medical terminology
title: Degeneration (medical)
